headline: Ecolab (ECL) Earnings Expected to Grow: What to Know Ahead of Next Week's Release
summary: Ecolab (ECL) possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: Erste Group Sees Limited Upside for Ecolab (ECL) at Current Valuation
summary: Ecolab Inc. (NYSE:ECL) is included among the Dividend Growth Stocks: 25 Aristocrats. On January 23, Erste Group lowered its rating on Ecolab Inc. (NYSE:ECL) to Hold from Buy. The decision came down to valuation. The firm said Ecolab’s price-to-earnings multiple now sits well above sector averages, a point the analyst highlighted in a research note. […]
